CmdLine: echo "Installing build prerequisites"            &&   apt-get update                                   &&   apt-get install -y git mercurial gcc             &&     echo "Downloading and building the Go release"   &&   hg clone -u release https://code.google.com/p/go &&   cd go/src && ./all.bash                          &&   export GOROOT=/go                                &&   export GOPATH=/go-tmp                            &&   export PATH=$GOROOT/bin:$PATH                    &&     echo "Downloading and building Iris"             &&   go get github.com/project-iris/iris              &&   mv $GOPATH/bin/iris $IRIS_BIN                    &&     echo "Cleaning up build environment"             &&   rm -r -f /go /go-tmp                             &&   apt-get autoremove -y git mercurial gcc
Commands.Name: run
